name: Hide header - Weather Underground
description: Page header is collapsed into the cloud+rainbow site logo. Mouse over the logo to restore the header. Less clutter, but without removing a thing.
additional_info: All pages on www.wunderground.com will use this style. It is valid CSS 3. (Woohoo!) N.B.: I use AdBlock Plus. If this page looks busier in your browser than in the screenshot, that's probably why. 01 Jul: Banner ad makes auto-hidden header unreachable on Opera. Fixed.

style_setting_options.label: Top of the screen - don't make me scroll to find it!
Top of the page - it's not a header if it's not at the head
